TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Republic_of_the_Congo, title = Republic_of_the_Congo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republic_of_the_Congo} }

S.FORM: Republic of the Congo u Republic of the Congo sa i labu nu Feico, itiza i 1 00 S, 15 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 342,000 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 341,500 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 500 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 4,852,412. kakalukan umah sa 31.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 65.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 3.30% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Brazzaville . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Denis Sassou Nguesso, micakat a demiad sa i 1997 a mihca 10 bulad 25 demiad. u cunli nu Congo kapulungan a kanatal ayza sa ci Anatole Collinet Makosso, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 5 bulad 12 demiad. Democratic Republic of the Congo , France (Fa-kuw 法國) a kamu, République démocratique du Congo, miwada tu nisulitan,"RDC",i tini i Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) i tepan nu kanatal, u kamu tu Min-cu-kang-kow han, Congo ('kim)(Congo-Kinshasa)han, tukus nu lala' kaahebal pakala tu 234.5 a mang km2, sakatusa tabakiay uynu dada' i Algeria (A-rl-ci-li-ya 阿爾及利亞) atu kitakit tu saka sabaw cacay a tabakiay a kanatal, u tademaw malabas tu 8,700 a mangaan i kitakit a tademaw saka sabaw enem ka katuud, Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) a tademaw saka sepat nu katuuday a kanatal, satusa i kitakiday a tademaw saktuuday nu Fa-yu-kow-cia a kamu nu kanatal, kahenulan a tuse u Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa 金夏沙). (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Democratic Republic of the Congo (法語:République démocratique du Congo,簡寫為RDC), (Congo-Kinshasa) . .) nu binawlanay a nisakaku Kang-kow-ze-yu-bang kakuniza a sakaput atu By-su-kang-kow , 1960 a mihcaan enem a bulad tulu bataan a demiad misakaku patizeng tu kanatal, uyni patizeng tu kanatal hasa, atu belaw i saayaway misateket tu uyzaanay u France tungusay nu malecaday tu Congo kapulungan a kanatal , mala u macu' tu nu kanatal a syakay, i tusaay a kanatal a ni pangangan hawsa, pasu kahenulan a tuse, u ngangan pala u kasazuma , namahini a singangan aca tu Congo kapulungan a kanatal Leopoldville (Li-aw-bo-de-wey-lr 利奧波德維爾), Congo 'kim (Congo-Kinshasa)han ku ngangan, 1964 a mihcaan pitu a bulad cacay a demiad, pasumat tu ngangan nu kanatal Democratic Republic of the Congo han tu, 1971 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bulad tusa bataan izaw ku pitu a demiad i kala cung-tungan ni Men-bo-tuo u tayzaay micumut a tademaw pasumat han ku ngangan nu kanatal Sa-yi (法語:Zaïre) han, 1997 a mihcaan lima a bulad sabaw pitu a demiad ci Luo-lang-ka-pi-la amikeliday tu Cang-kow-cya-fang-min-cu-li-lang-tung-meng micumut mingayaw tu Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa 金夏沙) pabaelin tu ni kuwanan Men-bo-tuo , mahiza a panukas tu ngangan nu kanatal Democratic Republic of the Congo katukuh ayza. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: (法語:Zaïre),1997年5月17日, .) 1998 a mihcaan malinga'tu tu sakatusa a ngangayaw nu Congo , uynian a kanatal mapelpel tuway, zayhan uynian a ngangayaw macalap ku siwaay nu Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) a kanatal pakala' tu 20 ku sibakudangay nu icelang, namahini pangangan han tu "Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) a ngangayaw i kitakit u kitakitay" a nu mahini i 2003 a mihcaan masasulit tu sakakapah a letek, nika winikalalebu, mahini tu malalid tunian a kanatal i nuwalian a kakitizaan, mipacici' mipenec mikacaw tu tatayna atu zumaay tu kakaydihan nu uzip u kapelpel kahizaan i kitakit u sa talakaway, uynian a ngangayaw, namakay 1998 a mihcaan mapatay ku tademaw tu 540 a mang. ayza nipangangan tu Kang-kow-kung-he-kow"剛果共和國"a kakitizaan, ayaw nu waluay a mang a mihcaan izaw tu tademaw nu muengay, i saayaw nu kasumamadan a laylay malingatu tu ku Congo Bantu a tademaw mabulawamin uheni i ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 2000 a mihcaan katukuh ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 500 a mihcaan namakay saetipan nuwamisan mabulaw tayza i masahelingay a kakitizaan, uyniantu a mihcaan pasu nu ayaway mabulaway a mihcaan, katukuh tu pabelin tu micunuday a tademaw, Bantu a tademaw mabilaw mikitay tu i tizaay nuenengay nu By-ke-mi-zen binacadan a tademaw, kuheni u lalangawan papulung pacumut tu ayzaay a Congo nu timulan a kakitizaan, Bantu a tademaw namakay satipan nutipan a Africa a kakitizaan nu Africa , minanam tuway tu sakalu atu numukingnay a sadiket atu mikawaw, nu Congo Bantu a kamu ku angangan a kamu. Min-cu-kang-ko i tepanay nu kanatal satipan nu Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲), teleklal mibaladay nu tepan a nuwamisan, nuwalian matatules tu U-kang-da , Luanda (Lu-an-da 盧安達),Pu-long-di ,Tan-san-niy-ya , nuamisan nu belaw Nan-su-dan , Cung-fay-cong-he-cow , nusatipan a kenis tuKang-kow-kung-he-kow , nutimulan a kenis u An-ke-la ,San-piy-ya Kang-ko-he a sauwac, namakay nuwalian pasayza satipan malikit i mahamin nu kanatal, nuzuma izaw ku U-pan-ci a sauwac, Lu-a-la-pa a sauwac u kahenulan nu likit nu sauwac, nuwalian a lilis nu kenis namakay amis pasayza i nutimulan izaw ku Ay-bu-te a taku,Ay-de-hua a taku,Ci-u a taku,Tan-kan-i-ke a taku atu Mu-uay-lu a takuan. Democratic Republic of the Congo a kakitizaan i teban nu Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) nu kanatal , i tiza i Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) balicu' nu teleklalan a kakitizaan, tabaki ku lala', tabaki ku lala' aazihan tu aatupan, Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) uyni dada' A-el-ci-li-ya u sakatusa tabakiay a kanatal, mahamin a kanatal pulung nu hekal a lala' 2 344,858 Ping-bang-kung-li nuwamisan a balaw u Cung-bey-kung-he-ko , nuwalian nuamisan atu Nan-su-dan matatules ku lala', nuwalian a balaw u Dung-bey-kung-he-kow masaapilis ku ilabu ku diheb, talulung ku nanaum salungan azihen atu U-kan-da Tan-san-ni-ya Luanda (Lu-an-da 盧安達) atu pulung-di matatulas, nutimulan atu An-ke-la matatules mababelaw nuwalian nutimulan San-pi-ya , satipan kenis nu Kang-ko , satipan nutimulan i salikit a sauwac Kang-ko-he , i salikit kalimucu' Ta-si-yang , dadipsan 37 Kung-li katanayu' dada'. 2001 a mihcaan cacay a bulad sabaw pitu a demiad, Lo-lang-de-si-lay-ka-pi-la mapatasasa nu saba a sakakaay nu hitay mapacuk mapatay tu ci La-sen-di-mi-ze-le (Rashidi Mizele), u wawa nu Ye-se-fu-ka-la-pi taluma i kanatal mala Cung-tung , mikawaw katukuh i 2019 a mihcaan 1 a bulad 24 a demiad. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 2001年1月18日,洛朗-德西雷· ·米澤勒(Rashidi Mizele)刺殺身亡,其子約瑟夫· 2019年1月24日.) 2006 a mihcan 7 abulad 30 a demiad, Congo 'kim mikawaw ku Kung-tung atu Ko-mi-iy-huay amisingkiw, 8 a bulad 20 a demiad, misaketeday misingkiw ku Uay-yuan-huay sakamusa,pasingkiwan tu Kung-tung nayay ku pakaalaay tu 50% kaipapaw a paya, ci Ye-se-fu-ca-pi-la atu Zang-pi-i-rlben-pa misingkiw aca tu sakatusa apisingkiw 10 a bulad 29 a deniad, sakatusa makakutay misingkiw tu a a Kung-tung 11 a bulad 15 a demiad, misatekeday misingkiway a uay-uang sakamusa, ci Ka-pi-rl ku masingkiway a Kung-tung ,12 a bulad 30 a demiad, ci An-tuo-ban-ci-can-cia mala u Cung-li . makay 1980 a mihcaan a tepan nu ciday hausa, Congo a 礦產 nulaculan mawada tu, kanahatu i 1960年 namisateket tulin i Nan-bey hausa Africa (Fey-zhou 非洲) a sakatusa ku kikay kusi nu kanatal, nika satabaki satu uyni kasakalamkam a malahat u mikimmay atu miba'tuay atu malukay u niu kange'luan kaizaw, saayaway atu sakatusa pingangayaw nu Congo atu1996年 mmalinga'tu tu macacukah, tabaki satu kini sakalawacu' nu Congo a tademaw nu kanatal nisangaan a aca atu caysan nu kanatal nu micumuday, a pabelinen ku suku nu kanatal micunus tu ku talakaw, tu ku nu nutawan a kinapinanay tu a ngangayaw, mapatay tu 500 a man kakatuud nu mapatayay a tademaw, malilit tu a makunga'lay atu imelang uynian a kanatal, pakala tu tulu a tusa ku tademaw caay ka kapah ku uzip. 剛果民主共 u malukay a kanatal, malahad發展 tu nikalukan, u lalabu nu kanatal masenged sidamek tu lala' mahini u nikalukan atuud yadah satu, hatu i kakuti'ay paluma', u ngannganan nu nipalumaan u a zung-gu-su a kilang, misangatu zung-gu a simal u kahenulan kuni , uyza satu nipalunaan nu kuhi ke-ke ,sanasay ,kupa ,papah nu katasaku ,tipus ,lami' , padingad , kubkub , tebus , kalitang ,galasu , paza' atu uza amin. tutuc tu 2016 a mihcaan年 pulung nisulitan a tademaw Democratic Republic of the Congo i lalabu nu kanatal pulung izaw ku 254個 ku ni kasaniyazu' nu binacadan, Bantu a kamu a kamuan musakamuay tuynian a kamu pakala tu pulung 84％ ku tademaw, Congo a binacadan, Nen-ciy-la a binacadan , Lu-pa a minacadan , Men-ke-en-ku-en-tu a men-ke-en-du a minacadan , Lung-da a binacadan , Su-ku a binacadan amin, u liwan satu u kamu Su-dan a kamu A-can-de a binacadan atu Ni-lu-de a kamu A-lu-rl a binacadan atu Pa ke-mi a banacadan amin, kamu nu kanatal u Fa a kamu , angangan a kamu izaw ku Lin-ciy-la a kamu Ci-kang-ku a kamu Ci-lu-pa a kamu atu Se-wa-si-li a kamu , u binawlan 55％ ku u Tin-si-kiw,35％ u baluhay a singku, nu zumaay pulung 10％. CIA 外交部

Repoblic of the Congo o Repoblic of the Congo sa i labo no Feico, itiza i 1 00 S, 15 00 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 342,000 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa 341,500 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 500 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 4,852,412. kakalokan omah sa 31.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 65.60%, zomaay henay omah sa 3.30% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Brazzaville . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 15 bolad 8 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Denis Sassoo Ngoesso, micakat a demiad sa i 1997 a mihca 10 bolad 25 demiad. o conli no Congo kapolongan a kanatal ayza sa ci Anatole Collinet Makosso, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 5 bolad 12 demiad. Democratic Repoblic of the Congo , France (Fa-kow 法國) a kamo, Répobliqoe démocratiqoe do Congo, miwada to nisolitan,"RDC",i tini i Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) i tepan no kanatal, o kamo to Min-co-kang-kow han, Congo ('kim)(Congo-Kinshasa)han, tokos no lala' kaahebal pakala to 234.5 a mang km2, sakatosa tabakiay oyno dada' i Algeria (A-rl-ci-li-ya 阿爾及利亞) ato kitakit to saka sabaw cacay a tabakiay a kanatal, o tademaw malabas to 8,700 a mangaan i kitakit a tademaw saka sabaw enem ka katood, Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) a tademaw saka sepat no katooday a kanatal, satosa i kitakiday a tademaw saktooday no Fa-yo-kow-cia a kamo no kanatal, kahenolan a tose o Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa 金夏沙). (o kamo no Holam sa: Democratic Repoblic of the Congo (法語:Répobliqoe démocratiqoe do Congo,簡寫為RDC), (Congo-Kinshasa) . .) no binawlanay a nisakako Kang-kow-ze-yo-bang kakoniza a sakapot ato By-so-kang-kow , 1960 a mihcaan enem a bolad tolo bataan a demiad misakako patizeng to kanatal, oyni patizeng to kanatal hasa, ato belaw i saayaway misateket to oyzaanay o France tongosay no malecaday to Congo kapolongan a kanatal , mala o maco' to no kanatal a syakay, i tosaay a kanatal a ni pangangan hawsa, paso kahenolan a tose, o ngangan pala o kasazoma , namahini a singangan aca to Congo kapolongan a kanatal Leopoldville (Li-aw-bo-de-wey-lr 利奧波德維爾), Congo 'kim (Congo-Kinshasa)han ko ngangan, 1964 a mihcaan pito a bolad cacay a demiad, pasomat to ngangan no kanatal Democratic Repoblic of the Congo han to, 1971 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bolad tosa bataan izaw ko pito a demiad i kala cong-tongan ni Men-bo-too o tayzaay micomot a tademaw pasomat han ko ngangan no kanatal Sa-yi (法語:Zaïre) han, 1997 a mihcaan lima a bolad sabaw pito a demiad ci Loo-lang-ka-pi-la amikeliday to Cang-kow-cya-fang-min-co-li-lang-tong-meng micomot mingayaw to Kinshasa (Cin-sia-sa 金夏沙) pabaelin to ni kowanan Men-bo-too , mahiza a panokas to ngangan no kanatal Democratic Repoblic of the Congo katokoh ayza. (o kamo no Holam sa: (法語:Zaïre),1997年5月17日, .) 1998 a mihcaan malinga'to to sakatosa a ngangayaw no Congo , oynian a kanatal mapelpel toway, zayhan oynian a ngangayaw macalap ko siwaay no Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) a kanatal pakala' to 20 ko sibakodangay no icelang, namahini pangangan han to "Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) a ngangayaw i kitakit o kitakitay" a no mahini i 2003 a mihcaan masasolit to sakakapah a letek, nika winikalalebo, mahini to malalid tonian a kanatal i nowalian a kakitizaan, mipacici' mipenec mikacaw to tatayna ato zomaay to kakaydihan no ozip o kapelpel kahizaan i kitakit o sa talakaway, oynian a ngangayaw, namakay 1998 a mihcaan mapatay ko tademaw to 540 a mang. ayza nipangangan to Kang-kow-kong-he-kow"剛果共和國"a kakitizaan, ayaw no waloay a mang a mihcaan izaw to tademaw no moengay, i saayaw no kasomamadan a laylay malingato to ko Congo Banto a tademaw mabolawamin oheni i ayaw no kasomamadan to 2000 a mihcaan katokoh ayaw no kasomamadan to 500 a mihcaan namakay saetipan nowamisan mabolaw tayza i masahelingay a kakitizaan, oynianto a mihcaan paso no ayaway mabolaway a mihcaan, katokoh to pabelin to miconoday a tademaw, Banto a tademaw mabilaw mikitay to i tizaay noenengay no By-ke-mi-zen binacadan a tademaw, koheni o lalangawan papolong pacomot to ayzaay a Congo no timolan a kakitizaan, Banto a tademaw namakay satipan notipan a Africa a kakitizaan no Africa , minanam toway to sakalo ato nomokingnay a sadiket ato mikawaw, no Congo Banto a kamo ko angangan a kamo. Min-co-kang-ko i tepanay no kanatal satipan no Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲), teleklal mibaladay no tepan a nowamisan, nowalian matatoles to U-kang-da , Loanda (Lo-an-da 盧安達),Po-long-di ,Tan-san-niy-ya , noamisan no belaw Nan-so-dan , Cong-fay-cong-he-cow , nosatipan a kenis toKang-kow-kong-he-kow , notimolan a kenis o An-ke-la ,San-piy-ya Kang-ko-he a saowac, namakay nowalian pasayza satipan malikit i mahamin no kanatal, nozoma izaw ko U-pan-ci a saowac, Lo-a-la-pa a saowac o kahenolan no likit no saowac, nowalian a lilis no kenis namakay amis pasayza i notimolan izaw ko Ay-bo-te a tako,Ay-de-hoa a tako,Ci-o a tako,Tan-kan-i-ke a tako ato Mo-oay-lo a takoan. Democratic Repoblic of the Congo a kakitizaan i teban no Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) no kanatal , i tiza i Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) balico' no teleklalan a kakitizaan, tabaki ko lala', tabaki ko lala' aazihan to aatopan, Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) oyni dada' A-el-ci-li-ya o sakatosa tabakiay a kanatal, mahamin a kanatal polong no hekal a lala' 2 344,858 Ping-bang-kong-li nowamisan a balaw o Cong-bey-kong-he-ko , nowalian noamisan ato Nan-so-dan matatoles ko lala', nowalian a balaw o Dong-bey-kong-he-kow masaapilis ko ilabo ko diheb, talolong ko nanaom salongan azihen ato U-kan-da Tan-san-ni-ya Loanda (Lo-an-da 盧安達) ato polong-di matatolas, notimolan ato An-ke-la matatoles mababelaw nowalian notimolan San-pi-ya , satipan kenis no Kang-ko , satipan notimolan i salikit a saowac Kang-ko-he , i salikit kalimoco' Ta-si-yang , dadipsan 37 Kong-li katanayo' dada'. 2001 a mihcaan cacay a bolad sabaw pito a demiad, Lo-lang-de-si-lay-ka-pi-la mapatasasa no saba a sakakaay no hitay mapacok mapatay to ci La-sen-di-mi-ze-le (Rashidi Mizele), o wawa no Ye-se-fo-ka-la-pi taloma i kanatal mala Cong-tong , mikawaw katokoh i 2019 a mihcaan 1 a bolad 24 a demiad. (o kamo no Holam sa: 2001年1月18日,洛朗-德西雷· ·米澤勒(Rashidi Mizele)刺殺身亡,其子約瑟夫· 2019年1月24日.) 2006 a mihcan 7 abolad 30 a demiad, Congo 'kim mikawaw ko Kong-tong ato Ko-mi-iy-hoay amisingkiw, 8 a bolad 20 a demiad, misaketeday misingkiw ko Uay-yoan-hoay sakamosa,pasingkiwan to Kong-tong nayay ko pakaalaay to 50% kaipapaw a paya, ci Ye-se-fo-ca-pi-la ato Zang-pi-i-rlben-pa misingkiw aca to sakatosa apisingkiw 10 a bolad 29 a deniad, sakatosa makakotay misingkiw to a a Kong-tong 11 a bolad 15 a demiad, misatekeday misingkiway a oay-oang sakamosa, ci Ka-pi-rl ko masingkiway a Kong-tong ,12 a bolad 30 a demiad, ci An-too-ban-ci-can-cia mala o Cong-li . makay 1980 a mihcaan a tepan no ciday haosa, Congo a 礦產 nolacolan mawada to, kanahato i 1960年 namisateket tolin i Nan-bey haosa Africa (Fey-zhoo 非洲) a sakatosa ko kikay kosi no kanatal, nika satabaki sato oyni kasakalamkam a malahat o mikimmay ato miba'toay ato malokay o nio kange'loan kaizaw, saayaway ato sakatosa pingangayaw no Congo ato1996年 mmalinga'to to macacokah, tabaki sato kini sakalawaco' no Congo a tademaw no kanatal nisangaan a aca ato caysan no kanatal no micomoday, a pabelinen ko soko no kanatal miconos to ko talakaw, to ko no notawan a kinapinanay to a ngangayaw, mapatay to 500 a man kakatood no mapatayay a tademaw, malilit to a makonga'lay ato imelang oynian a kanatal, pakala to tolo a tosa ko tademaw caay ka kapah ko ozip. 剛果民主共 o malokay a kanatal, malahad發展 to nikalokan, o lalabo no kanatal masenged sidamek to lala' mahini o nikalokan atood yadah sato, hato i kakoti'ay paloma', o ngannganan no nipalomaan o a zong-go-so a kilang, misangato zong-go a simal o kahenolan koni , oyza sato nipalonaan no kohi ke-ke ,sanasay ,kopa ,papah no katasako ,tipos ,lami' , padingad , kobkob , tebos , kalitang ,galaso , paza' ato oza amin. totoc to 2016 a mihcaan年 polong nisolitan a tademaw Democratic Repoblic of the Congo i lalabo no kanatal polong izaw ko 254個 ko ni kasaniyazo' no binacadan, Banto a kamo a kamoan mosakamoay toynian a kamo pakala to polong 84％ ko tademaw, Congo a binacadan, Nen-ciy-la a binacadan , Lo-pa a minacadan , Men-ke-en-ko-en-to a men-ke-en-do a minacadan , Long-da a binacadan , So-ko a binacadan amin, o liwan sato o kamo So-dan a kamo A-can-de a binacadan ato Ni-lo-de a kamo A-lo-rl a binacadan ato Pa ke-mi a banacadan amin, kamo no kanatal o Fa a kamo , angangan a kamo izaw ko Lin-ciy-la a kamo Ci-kang-ko a kamo Ci-lo-pa a kamo ato Se-wa-si-li a kamo , o binawlan 55％ ko o Tin-si-kiw,35％ o balohay a singko, no zomaay polong 10％. CIA 外交部
